name: Bone Saw Machine J210
line2: 650W motor, 220V/50Hz, cutting speed 15m/min, blade thickness 0.5mm, cutting height <200mm. Stainless steel body with 1650mm saw blade. Compact and durable for butcher shops and meat processing.

name: Bone Saw Machine J310
line2: 1.1kW motor, 220V/50Hz, cutting speed 15m/min, blade size 2000×20mm, max height 260mm. Aluminum alloy housing and stainless steel table, heavy-duty design for professional use.

name: Bone Saw Machine YF-F120A
line2: 850W power, 220V/50Hz, cutting speed 15m/min, max height 128mm, stainless steel frame, 1650×16×0.56mm saw blade. Compact and efficient for meat, frozen fish, or bone cutting.

name: Bone Saw Machine YF-F210A
line2: 1500W motor, 220V/50Hz, cutting speed 15m/min, cutting width up to 220mm, height 200mm. Uses 1650×0.56×16mm saw blade. Heavy-duty stainless steel design for bone, frozen meat, or fish.

name: Bone Saw Machine YF-F300A
line2: 2.2kW motor, 220V/50Hz, speed 15m/min, cutting range 0–190mm, height 325mm, 2120mm saw blade. Premium stainless steel construction for continuous heavy-duty meat cutting.

name: UK Bone Saw Blades
line2: High-quality imported blades from the UK, 2–3× longer lifespan. Sizes: 1200mm, 1650mm, 1850mm, 2000mm, 2120mm. Suitable for cutting pork, beef bones, frozen fish, and meat.

name: Bone Saw Blade 1200mm
line2: Professional-grade 1200mm bone saw blade made in the UK. Carbon steel material, 4T teeth pattern, suitable for W120A & SJY120 machines. Cuts meat and frozen fish with high precision.
